$eref.description: Holds attributes of an ANS story.
$eref.title: A story.

___branch.description: The name of the branch within Story API that this operation occurs on, if any

___story_id.description: The id of the story being operated

___version.description: The version of ANS this Story is written in

___type.description: Identifies this as an ANS operation

___revision_id.description: The id of the specific revision that this operation occurs on, if any

___date.description: When the operation should be considered performed

___operation.description: The identifier of the operation being performed

___editions.description: A list of identifiers of editions that are changed in this operation, if any
